basics.label: Aviation Electronics Technician
basics.summary: Highly skilled and successful professional with solid and diverse experience in comprehensive military and civilian leadership settings. Currently seeking to leverage academic background with professional expertise to secure a challenging and rewarding position in Business Management with a company that is established and poised for growth. Demonstrated proficiency in Human Resources and Financials with outstanding ability to effectively oversee complex projects from conception to completion.

work.name: Company Name
work.summary: Winner of numerous awards for training and supervising military personnel in the completion of >2,000 maintenance exercises, as well as receiving inspector qualifications for primary and cross-trained rate of aviation electrician's mate.
highlights: Maintained 100% accountability of a large section of equipment worth over $50,000,000 during multiple overseas deployments.
Successfully captured accounting errors placed on orders, preventing a substantial financial loss of >150K.

work.name: Company Name
work.summary: Oversaw management of collections; providing leadership, training and performance analysis to ensure staff proficiency and compliance with all applicable laws governing debt collections.
highlights: Created a positive cash flow by successfully negotiating settlements for delinquent accounts.

interests.name: Co-Founder of Boys to Men Mentoring Program
